title: "Mount Recyclemore" sculpture to stare down Biden and other G7 leaders in U.K., demanding they tackle e-waste
content:
1. "Mount Recyclemore" sculpture to stare down Biden and other G7 leaders in U.K., demanding they tackle e-waste  CBS News
  2. G7: 'Mount Recyclemore' of leaders made from electronic waste in Cornwall  BBC News
  3. Artist builds sculpture of G7 leaders with electronic waste  The Indian Express
  4. ‘Mount Recyclemore’ artwork of G7 leaders created in Cornwall  ITV News
  5. 'Mount Rushmore' of G7 leaders out of waste electronics at Carbis Bay  Falmouth Packet
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: "英国でバイデンをはじめとするG7首脳を睨みつける「Mount Recyclemore」の彫刻が登場、廃棄物対策を要求
在英国，"Mount Recyclemore "雕塑盯着拜登和其他G7领导人，要求他们解决电子垃圾问题
在英國，"Mount Recyclemore "雕塑盯着拜登和其他G7領導人，要求他們解決電子垃圾問題
